1.title: SOCK It to Me

episode of.title: Can They Get Away with It? (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Kandra and Toby approach complete strangers and request that they give them one of the socks off their feet because they are in a Scavenger hunt. People are randomly selected from the street to guess whether or not they can get away with it. Only the contestants know that they are on TV. Hysterics occur. Winners receive a FREE pair of socks AND a gift card.

2.title: The Zany Rules of Golf

episode of.title: Can They Get Away with It? (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Toby and Kandra join golfers for a round of golf. They politely correct the golfers they are playing with some "fake rules" of playing golf. Will the other golfers go along with these ZANY RULES of GOLF? What will the contestants say? If they're right, they can win a free round of golf. If they're wrong, they will have laughed themselves off the course.

3.title: The SAND WICH Got Away!

episode of.title: Can They Get Away with It? (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Kandra buys a sandwich at a sandwich shop. She attempts to return it the next day because she forgot to eat it. Random people are interviewed off the streets and asked to guess whether or not she will get away with it? Only the contestants know that they are on TV. A very funny episode where everyone is left laughing out loud. Winners receive a dinner cruise.

4.title: CATCH a WAVE of STUFF

episode of.title: Can They Get Away with It? (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Kandra and Sam pull random contestants from the beach and ask them if they think they can get strangers to hold all kinds of wacky gadgets for them. Will They Get Away With It?

imdb.plot outline: Contestants are randomly selected off the streets to guess whether or not Kandra and her sidekick Toby can get away with something absurd! If Contestants guess correctly, they win great prizes such as cruises! If the guess wrong, they get to laugh a lot!
